3: Like newborn babies flapping their limbs, a hunting claw extrudes from the head of the Polyphage and waves around, preying.
The top of the Polyphage is displaying a massive energy response. That should be where Luna is.
Like an immune system of a living organism, a large number of Hetero-Creatures react to Gray Raven's arrival by overwhelming them like a flood.
We can't stop here. Lee, take care of the enemies to the sides, and I'll open us a path!
A Hetero-Creature lunges toward the two of them from behind, only to be shot down by the ray of a laser.
In the back, Liv waves at you as she shoots down the creature with her mounted guns.
I know we can always rely on Liv.
That's why we can have each other's back... That is why we are Gray Raven.
The four of you tread upward toward the Heteromer, going as fast as you can, knowing that this is a race against time.
